name: Forge Master
description:
A dwarf weaponsmith is on a quest to build a sword for the hero of his town, but to do so he must acquire the stones that make up this special sword.

Fight your way through a big cave full of spiders to find these powerful stones with the help of your different hammer types. Controller very recommended. Please look at help in the start menu to see controls, and there is currently no end to the game so you've beaten the game when you've found 4 of the big differently colored rocks
